TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateSettersBuilder extends System.Object

summary.para: Supports specifying property and value to be set in ExecuteUpdate method with chaining multiple calls for updating multiple columns.
This type does not have any constructor or implementation since it is used inside LINQ query solely for the purpose of creating expression tree.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions and How EF Core queries work for more information and examples.
